r e l e a s e info
| '
Postmortem is a short exploratory adventure game taking place in a '
' fictional industrial-age country of Galicia, ravaged by five years of
violent rioting between two ideologically and economically divided
` communities. You play as death incarnate, sent to a fundraising gala
` with the objective of claiming a single life from any of its attendants
` and staff

By exploring the space, conversing with the patrons, and uncovering: various clues, you will learn about the world and the characters
| revealing how their deaths might (or might not!) influence the country
|
| But how much should you meddle with mortal affairs? Perhaps a random
| choice is the fairest? What other effects could your involvement have?
|: | More info: http://www.postmortemgame.com |
| |
| Support Developers, vote this game on Steam Greenlight at: |
| |
||
| |
